doc:
Bruce Thomas (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Thomas_(actor) 0 Bruce Thomas (born May 17, 1961) is an American actor known for portraying the character of Batman in a series of commercials for General Motors' OnStar service that aired from 2000 to 2002. Bruce_Thomas ( born May_17_,_1961 ) is an_American_actor known for portraying the_character of Batman in a_series of commercials for General_Motors '_OnStar_service that aired from 2000 to 2002 .
